pkgmetadata.longdescription: Models for Survival Analysis // Implementations of classical and machine learning models for survival analysis, including deep neural networks via 'keras' and 'tensorflow'. Each model includes a separated fit and predict interface with consistent prediction types for predicting risk or survival probabilities. Models are either implemented from 'Python' via 'reticulate' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=reticulate, from code in GitHub packages, or novel implementations using 'Rcpp' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Rcpp. Neural networks are implemented from the 'Python' package 'pycox' https://github.com/havakv/pycox.
